Interface GameControls

All Known Subinterfaces:
PropertyChangeEnabledGameControls
All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface GameControls
Defines mutable behaviors for a simple "game".
Version:
Winter 2025
Author:
Charles Bryan

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    GameControls.Move
    Constants describing the valid moves for a game piece.
    static final record 
    GameControls.Point
    Data class that represents a "point" on the game board.
    static final record 
    GameControls.ValidMoves
    Data class that represents the which moves are valid in the current state of the Game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    move(GameControls.Move theMove)
    Moves the game piece in the direction described by the enum theMove.
    void
    moveDown()
    Moves the game piece down.
    void
    moveLeft()
    Moves the game piece left.
    void

    Moves the game piece right.
    void

    Moves the game piece up.
    void
    newGame()
    Starts a new game with the piece in the starting location.

  • Method Details

    • move

      void move(GameControls.Move theMove)
      Moves the game piece in the direction described by the enum theMove. If the piece is unable to move in the direction described by theMove, no action is performed.
      Parameters:
      theMove - the direction in which to move the game piece.

    • moveUp

      void moveUp()
      Moves the game piece up. If the piece is unable to move up, no action is performed.

    • moveDown

      void moveDown()
      Moves the game piece down. If the piece is unable to move down, no action is performed.

    • moveRight

      void moveRight()
      Moves the game piece right. If the piece is unable to move right, no action is performed.

    • moveLeft

      void moveLeft()
      Moves the game piece left. If the piece is unable to move left, no action is performed.

    • newGame

      void newGame()
      Starts a new game with the piece in the starting location.
